transArray.content: Overall, I am very satisfied. The room is clean and tidy. The service staff are very friendly. It is very convenient to travel near the subway. The hotel's breakfast is also very rich. I will stay here again if necessary next time.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel rooms and the room ladies. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. , cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay. Thank you. ! Manager: Zhao Dan
